mission.posting: Kael is concerned with the person that tried to hack into AEGIS servers, give him the IP of the hacker.

email.subject: Intruders
email.body:
#PLAYERNAME#, You've been part of AEGIS for a time now, and I need you to find the person that tried to reach our servers, specifically the Whitelist server, look, despite who it is, you should do what I say and track them down, and give me the IP, I shall know what to do with them, I'll be waiting #PLAYERNAME#.
I've linked you the Whitelist Server
